android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.description: Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.description: Access fine location sources, such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are and may consume additional battery power.

android.permission.CAMERA.description: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.description: Allows application to access the audio record path.

android.permission.BIND_WALLPAPER.description: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of wallpaper. Should never be needed for common applications.

android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS.description: Allows an application to read the sync settings, such as whether sync is enabled for Contacts.

android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER.description: Allows the application to set the system wallpaper.

android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_READ.description: Allows an application to receive details about the currently synced feeds.

android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_WRIT.description: Allows an application to modify your currently synced feeds. This could allow a malicious application to change your synced feeds.

android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.info: use the authentication credentials of an account
android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.description: Allows an application to request authentication tokens.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS.description: Allows an application to modify the sync settings, such as whether sync is enabled for Contacts.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYS.description: Allows the application to mount and unmount file systems for removable storage.

manifest_analysis.title:
Clear text traffic is Enabled For App
[android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: The app intends to use cleartext network traffic, such as cleartext HTTP, FTP stacks, DownloadManager, and MediaPlayer. The default value for apps that target API level 27 or lower is "true". Apps that target API level 28 or higher default to "false". The key reason for avoiding cleartext traffic is the lack of confidentiality, authenticity, and protections against tampering; a network attacker can eavesdrop on transmitted data and also modify it without being detected.
manifest_analysis.name: Clear text traffic is Enabled For App [android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup] flag is missing.
manifest_analysis.desc: The flag [android:allowBackup] should be set to false. By default it is set to true and allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup] flag is missing.

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (com.ijoysoft.file.dialog.DialogProgress) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

playstore_details.title: HD Camera – Best Filters Cam & Beauty Camera
playstore_details.description:
HD Camera is a fully-featured Filters Cam & Beauty Camera,  lets you easily shoot HD photos and videos, HD Camera with Quick Snap and Panorama mode, and offers Photo Sphere, and lots of beautiful filters, Real-time preview and capture the beautiful photos and videos with filters effects, You can get many fantastic camera features with this professional HD Camera. 💯❤️

HD Camera is also the best Selfie Camera & Beauty Camera, it contains powerful &  professional Photo Editor features lets you easily edit your photos, videos.  

📷 Camera Key Features: 📷
✦ HD Camera: Support quick snap photo, HD video capture, panorama mode.
✦ Panorama: By taken an immersive 360-degree panorama function, you can get a perfect panoramic photo, panorama mode requires use a gyro sensor.
✦ Photo Gallery: Built-in photo gallery function can easily view and manage your HD photo and HD video.
✦ Amazing Real-time Filters: HD Camera contains more than 70 + wonderful and beautiful funny filters .
✦ Photo Size: Support 4:3, 16:9, 1:1, full size to capture your photos and videos.
✦ Resolution: You can choose lots of photo or video resolutions.
✦ Accurate location: Accurate record the shooting location information.
✦ HDR function: Used in the light obviously change.
✦ Easy to use: Easy shot video & photo, support time-lapse capture photo or video by setting timer.
✦ Volume key Control: Set whether to use volume key take photos.
✦ Beautiful Scene: Sunset, Party, Sports, Night, etc.
✦ White Balance: Auto, white, daylight, cloudy, fluorescent.
✦ Focus: Tap to focus, zoom in/out display, support auto-focus or touch to focus.
✦ Flash Mode: Auto flash on/off.
✦  Exposure: Setting exposure value for taking pictures.
✦ Front and rear camera: Support front and rear camera to shot photo and videos.
✦ Line Support: Reference Line.
✦ Storage path: Setting the path for photos and videos.

👉 Photo Editor Key Features: 👈
♥ Amazing Filters: Real-time filters to photos.
♥ Wonderful Sticks: 30+ wonderful commonly used sticks .
♥ Funny Mosaic: Various shapes of mosaics help you hide photo content.
♥ Beautiful Frames: Add beautiful frames to photos and share with friends.
♥ Text feature: Support add text on photos, and set text color, size, bubble, style.
♥ Crop photo: Easily crop and rotate photo, provide lots of size to adjust photo size, easily flip photos horizontally and vertically.
♥ Photo adjustment: Support many photo adjustment, such as brightness, contrast, hue, exposure, saturation, shadow, tone, etc.
♥ Collage function: Photo editor features has lots of collage background and collage template, easily combine photos by this function.
♥ Easily share: Share photos & videos to anywhere.
♥ Doodle function: Text in photos, lots of doodle shape and color you can choose.
♥ HDR: Adjust photo HDR.
♥ Photo effect: Vignette, Sharpening, Grain, Fish eye, Glow, and etc. 
♥ Compare: Easily compare original and edited photos.

HD Camera is a style camera with many features, good adaptation to various android devices, allows you to shoot a beautiful photo and video in a fast and simply way. Please download this great camera, it will never let you disappointed, now let us start shoot beautiful lens it.🎊🎉💯🌿
